title: Electron rewrite parity for companion preservation
description: Ship Node/Electron app to replace Python UI while keeping extraction, generation, review/edit, and export workflows stable for non-technical users.

title: Add provider-backed persona/memory extraction in Node pipeline
description: Replace heuristic-only draft generation with provider-configurable LLM extraction/synthesis passes (OpenAI/OpenRouter/Ollama/Anthropic-compatible) and strict JSON validation/fallback handling.
close_reason: Provider-backed Node pipeline parity delivered and validated via typecheck/test/build + smoke generation run.

comments.author: vega
comments.text: Implemented live provider-backed Electron flow: provider model discovery, LLM prompt-based persona/memory generation with append-memory scan manifest, fidelity evaluation + judge scoring, and full settings wiring in renderer.

title: Support loading existing card/lorebook outputs into review editor
description: Allow users to open previously generated character card and lorebook JSON files and edit/save them in the Electron renderer so memories reliably reload across sessions.
close_reason: Added load-review IPC and UI flow to load existing character_card_v3.json and lorebook_v3.json from an output directory into the editor, with parser support for wrapped lorebook payloads and renderer store tests.

title: Package desktop app for one-click install on macOS/Windows/Linux
description: Add electron-builder pipeline, app metadata/icons, and release artifacts so non-technical users can run the tool without Python or manual Node setup.

title: Integrate rich card editor components (milkdown/character-foundry patterns)
description: Upgrade the review UI from plain textareas to a structured editor with markdown fidelity, section helpers, and safer large-text editing without freezing the renderer.

comments.author: vega
comments.text: Implemented top-tab desktop workflow (Import Data, Recover Persona, Edit Persona + Fidelity Test, Settings), markdown card rendering with newline repair, lore split view, and centralized settings. Remaining scope: migrate persona/lore editors to Milkdown/character-foundry component patterns and wire provider-backed fidelity execution.

comments.author: vega
comments.text: UI pass landed: Import tab simplified (no path text input), top-level Fidelity Test tab split from Edit Persona, persona image upload + persisted save/load path support added, and Export Persona action now writes a fresh export directory via save pipeline.

title: Unify IPC contracts and validate initial Electron workspace
description: Merge foundation/pipeline/renderer tracks, reconcile shared IPC types, and ensure workspace typecheck/test/build succeed.
close_reason: Merged parallel tracks, fixed IPC schema typing, added workspace test task, and validated with full typecheck/test/build plus export smoke tests.

title: Cache per-model extracted JSONL and support append-memory runs
description: Extract once into per-model conversation JSONL cache keyed by source fingerprint, generate from cached files, and support append-memory runs that track scanned files/manifests.
close_reason: Implemented extraction cache keyed by source fingerprint, switched generation to process selected extracted JSONL files, added append-memory mode with scan manifests/history, and validated with full typecheck/test/build.
